Cloud Koh

Korean: 구름

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Koh Hyung-seok
Native name:
고형석
Birthday:
Apr 6, 1991
Age:
34 years old
Group (2011-2018,2025-present):
Bye Bye Badman
Group (2018-present):
The Volunteers until Feb 28, 2024

Introduction

CLOUD is a South Korean singer-songwriter and producer. He is a member of the rock bands Bye Bye Badman and The Volunteers, and a former member of CHEEZE. He made his solo debut on November 14, 2016 with debut single, "Cloud 1 'The Way You Make Me'".
